dashboard.configureBinance: Configure your Binance API key in Settings to view real-time data

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure Binance API and trading settings
settings.binanceNote: Binance API integration enables real-time market data fetching and live trade execution. You can test the connection without submitting credentials for public data. For trading operations, you'll need to provide your Binance API key and secret.
settings.howTo: How to get Binance API credentials
settings.step1: Log in to your Binance account
settings.step3: Create a new API key with appropriate permissions
settings.step4: Copy the API Key and Secret Key
settings.step5: Paste them in the fields above
settings.step6: For security, enable 'Restrict access to trusted IPs only'
settings.step7: Enable only 'Enable Reading' for monitoring, or 'Enable Spot & Margin Trading' for automated trading
settings.securityNote: Never share your API secret with anyone. Store it securely and use only in trusted applications. Consider using paper trading mode first to test the bot without risking real funds.
settings.realModeDesc: Your bot is trading with real money from your Binance account. All trades will execute on the live market.
settings.paperModeDesc: Your bot is simulating trades with virtual money. No real funds are used.
settings.tradingWarningDesc: Real trading mode will execute actual trades on Binance using your account funds. Only use real mode if you understand the risks and have tested your strategy in paper mode first.
settings.realModeWarning1: You are about to enable REAL MONEY trading. This means:
settings.realModeWarning2: All trades will execute on the live Binance market
settings.realModeWarning3: Real funds from your Binance account will be used
settings.realModeWarning4: You can lose money based on market conditions
settings.realModeWarning5: Trading fees will apply to all transactions
settings.realModeWarning6: ‚ö†Ô∏è Only proceed if you have tested your strategy thoroughly in paper mode and understand the risks.
settings.resetWarningDesc: This will permanently delete all your application data including:
settings.resetWarning1: All trading history and performance data
settings.resetWarning3: API credentials (you'll need to reconfigure Binance connection)
settings.resetWarning4: All portfolio data and transaction records
settings.confirmResetDesc: Are you absolutely sure you want to reset all application data?
settings.resetIrreversibleWarning: This action cannot be undone. You will lose:
settings.resetLoss2: All bot configurations and custom strategies
settings.finalConfirmation: This is your final confirmation. Type 'RESET' to proceed.
settings.resetSuccess: All data has been reset successfully
